contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|-oni|oni}} {{Nihongo|'''[[Oni]]'''|鬼}} are demons or ghouls (ghosts) of [[Japanese folklore]]. '''Oni''' may also refer to: * [[Oni, Georgia]], a town in the Republic of Georgia * [[Oni (video game)|''Oni'' (video game)]], a 2001 third-person shooter video game made by Bungie Studios * [[Oni Press]], an independent comic book publisher * [[Onimusha (series)]], a series of action video games made by Capcom * Oni Aliens, [[List of Gantz characters#Aliens|foes in the ''Gantz'' manga]] * ''Oni'' the title of a linked video game and film project based on an unfinished Akira Kurosawa script, that was later renamed ''[[Ni-Oh]]'' * Oni, a race of aliens from the manga and anime ''[[Urusei Yatsura]]'' * Oni, the kanji representing the Challenge difficulty level in the game ''[[Dance Dance Revolution]]'' * Oni or ooni, ancient kings of Nigeria's [[Yoruba people]] * Oni, an alternate form of [[Akuma (Street Fighter)#Oni|Akuma]] that appears in the ''Super Street Fighter IV: Arcade Edition'' video game * Oni, an antagonist character on [[Mortal Kombat: Shaolin Monks]] video game. '''ONI''' may refer to: * [[Office of Naval Intelligence]], the United States Navy's intelligence agency * [[National Olympiad of Informatics]] (''Olimpiada Naţională de Informatică''), the most important Romanian informatics competition * [[OpenNet Initiative]], a project for tracking the use of internet filtering and surveillance * ONI Systems Corporation, an optical networking company acquired by [[Ciena]] Corporation in 2002 {{disambiguation}}
